verses.verse: Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me, <S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H5750>yet,<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H157>beloved<s%> of her <S%H7453>friend,<s%> yet an <S%H5003>adulteress,<s%> according to the <S%H160>love<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H854>toward<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> <S%H6437>look<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H809>flagons<s%> of <S%H6025>wine.<s%>

So I <S%H3739>bought<s%> her to me for <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for an <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and an half <S%H3963>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley:<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> to her, You shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> for me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> you shall not play the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> and you shall not be for another <S%H376>man:<s%> <S%H1571>so<s%> will I <S%H1571>also<s%> be for you.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> a <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> a <S%H8269>prince,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H6755>image,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and without <S%H8655>teraphim:<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king;<s%> and shall <S%H6342>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and his <S%H2898>goodness<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
